docs.text: Mogoca - Mock Google Cloud API & Services ¶ Mock Google Cloud API & Services Documentation : https://hyahiaoui.github.io/mogoca/ Source Code : https://github.com/hyahiaoui/mogoca Development ¶ Setup environement ¶ You should have Pipenv installed. Then, you can install the dependencies with: pipenv install --dev After that, activate the virtual environment: pipenv shell Available commands ¶ You can check out the available commands, with their documentation, using make help or, make Run unit tests ¶ You can run all the tests with: make test Alternatively, you can run pytest yourself: pytest Format the code ¶ Execute the following command to apply isort and black formatting: make format License ¶ This project is licensed under the terms of the MIT license.
docs.title: About
